availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Isabella Mitchell. Father of Leah G. Mitchell, Cora Mitchell, Jerome W. Mitchell, Billy E. Mitchell, Margaret Mitchell, and George W. Mitchell. Farmer in Union County in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Morganfield, p. 86. Find A Grave, "Whitmal Miles Mitchell (1821-1896)", Memorial #139718881, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=139718881&ref=acom (accessed April 28, 2017).
